name: Herlind The Sister
description:
From one community to another, Herlind sows the seeds of happiness. The villagers and townfolks welcome her presence with songs, and she alleviates their heavy hearts.

As the priestess of The Order Of The Song, she enjoys traveling. Wherever she goes, there is much rejoicing. Her epithet came from the way her beloved people regard her: a sister to everyone.

2048 x 2048, done in Procreate
